Will you consider that it was you yourself who acted a part in the work, that has brought the displeasure of God upon his instrumentality in Battle Creek. Not you alone, but those also who were connected with you, had warning after warning. God desires that the principles upon which his institution was first established, 
                                                                           1656
shall be maintained at any cost. There must be a close searching of the Scriptures, to know the way of the Lord.
